questions.explanation: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets.

questions.questionText: Which CSS property is used to change the text color of an element?
questions.explanation: The 'color' property is used to change the text color of an element in CSS.

questions.questionText: Which CSS property is used to add spacing between elements?
questions.explanation: The 'margin' property is used to add spacing between elements in CSS.

questions.questionText: Which CSS property is used to make text bold?
questions.explanation: The 'font-weight' property is used to make text bold in CSS.

questions.questionText: Which CSS property is used to add a background image to an element?
questions.explanation: The 'background-image' property is used to add a background image to an element in CSS.

questions.questionText: Which CSS property is used to control the transparency of an element?
questions.explanation: The 'opacity' property is used to control the transparency of an element in CSS.

questions.questionText: Which CSS property is used to align text horizontally within an element?
questions.explanation: The 'text-align' property is used to align text horizontally within an element in CSS.

questions.questionText: Which CSS property is used to control the size of the font?
questions.explanation: The 'font-size' property is used to control the size of the font in CSS.

questions.questionText: Which CSS property is used to add a border around an element?
questions.explanation: The 'border' property is used to add a border around an element in CSS.
